course_title_2026: Democracy in Practice in the Global South
best_gem_comment: Take this class with Prof.. Weaver! She is very nice, and the reading can be a bit tedious, but it is worth it. Please don't think it is a gem, but as a class to learn more about the global South and democratization. It is a comparative government class where the information is presented clearly in class, and then we synthesize our thoughts in class. You will be expected to do a lot of work in this role.
best_gem_comment_short: Please don't think it is a gem, but as a class to learn more about the global South and democratization.
